entities.createSql: CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `${TABLE_NAME}` (`recipientAddress` TEXT NOT NULL, `recipientType` TEXT NOT NULL, `senderAddress` TEXT NOT NULL, `messageId` TEXT NOT NULL, `messageType` TEXT NOT NULL, `creationTimeUtc` INTEGER NOT NULL, `expirationTimeUtc` INTEGER NOT NULL, `storagePath` TEXT NOT NULL, `size` INTEGER NOT NULL, PRIMARY KEY(`senderAddress`, `messageId`))

indices.name: index_Message_recipientAddress
indices.createSql: CREATE INDEX IF NOT EXISTS `index_Message_recipientAddress` ON `${TABLE_NAME}` (`recipientAddress`)

indices.name: index_Message_recipientType
indices.createSql: CREATE INDEX IF NOT EXISTS `index_Message_recipientType` ON `${TABLE_NAME}` (`recipientType`)

indices.name: index_Message_messageType
indices.createSql: CREATE INDEX IF NOT EXISTS `index_Message_messageType` ON `${TABLE_NAME}` (`messageType`)

indices.name: index_Message_expirationTimeUtc
indices.createSql: CREATE INDEX IF NOT EXISTS `index_Message_expirationTimeUtc` ON `${TABLE_NAME}` (`expirationTimeUtc`)

setupQueries: CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS room_master_table (id INTEGER PRIMARY KEY,identity_hash TEXT)
